mapper.select: SELECT sum( c.num ) FROM kxmall_cart AS c WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.id, c.sku_id AS skuId, c.num, p.title, s.price, p.original_price AS originalPrice, k.title AS skuTitle, p.img AS spuImg, k.img AS skuImg, s.stock, k.spu_id AS spuId, p.category_id AS categoryId, c.activity_id AS activityId, c.coupon_id AS couponId, c.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, c.gmt_create AS gmtCreate FROM kxmall_cart AS c, kxmall_sku AS k, kxmall_spu AS p, kxmall_stock as s WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.sku_id = k.id AND k.spu_id = p.id AND p.id = s.spu_id and c.sku_id = s.sku_id and s.storage_id = #{storageId} and c.activity_id = 0 union all SELECT c.id, c.sku_id AS skuId, c.num, p.title, couponSku.discount_price as price, p.original_price AS originalPrice, k.title AS skuTitle, p.img AS spuImg, k.img AS skuImg, couponSku.limit_num as stock, k.spu_id AS spuId, p.category_id AS categoryId, c.activity_id AS activityId, c.coupon_id AS couponId, c.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, c.gmt_create AS gmtCreate FROM kxmall_cart AS c, kxmall_sku AS k, kxmall_spu AS p, kxmall_stock as s, kxmall_coupon_sku as couponSku WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.sku_id = k.id AND k.spu_id = p.id AND p.id = s.spu_id and couponSku.coupon_id = c.coupon_id and couponSku.spu_id = s.spu_id and c.sku_id = s.sku_id and s.storage_id = #{storageId} and c.activity_id not in (0)
